description: The file is a React component implementing a personal notes application's main page, including note management, local storage persistence, search, keyboard shortcuts, and UI rendering.

methods.name: isBrowser
methods.description: Checks whether the code is running in a browser environment by verifying if 'window' is defined.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from localStorage, initializing with seed notes if none exist.

methods.name: saveNotes
methods.description: Persists the array of notes to localStorage.

methods.name: seedNotes
methods.description: Generates initial seed notes with sample content.

methods.name: cryptoRandomId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID using crypto.randomUUID() if available, else falls back to a random string.

methods.name: useDebouncedCallback
methods.description: Creates a debounced version of a callback function to limit execution frequency.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component rendering the notes app's UI, managing state, effects, and user interactions.
